summary: Frontend-only testing for glass-morphism UI enhancement with tsparticles animations, framer-motion scroll effects, and big bold typography. All 12 features tested successfully - particles visible on all dark sections, parallax scrolling working, animations rendering correctly.

issues: Canvas2D console warning about 'willReadFrequently' attribute - minor performance optimization suggestion from tsparticles, not blocking

critical_code_review_comments: ContactModal, CVModal, ConsultationModal are missing data-testid attributes on root elements - recommend adding for easier testing
seed_data_creation: Newsletter test subscription created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Major glass-morphism UI enhancement complete with tsparticles and framer-motion. All dark sections have particle animations (hero, stats, industries, CTA on homepage; hero, mission/vision, global footprint, CTA on about page). Typography: Hero H1 at 80px (5rem), stat numbers at 96px (6rem) with orange color (#E8601C). Fonts: Fraunces for headlines, Outfit for body. Glass cards use backdrop-filter blur with semi-transparent backgrounds.

tested_features.homepage_loads: PASS - No React crashes, no console errors (only Canvas2D warning from tsparticles)
tested_features.hero_particles_animation: PASS - 4 canvas elements found, particles with floating dots and connecting lines visible
tested_features.hero_word_by_word_reveal: PASS - Headline animates word-by-word on load
tested_features.hero_parallax: PASS - Background, mid-layer, and foreground parallax using framer-motion useScroll/useTransform
tested_features.stats_section_6rem_numbers: PASS - Stat numbers at 96px (6rem), orange color, count-up animation from 0 to final value
tested_features.stats_section_particles: PASS - Particles visible in stats section background
tested_features.services_staggered_animation: PASS - 6 service cards with staggered entrance animation on scroll
tested_features.industries_particles_scroll: PASS - Industries section has particles and scrolling industry strip
tested_features.cta_particles_buttons: PASS - CTA section has particles, Schedule Consultation and Submit CV buttons work (open modals)
tested_features.about_page_particles: PASS - About page loads with particles on all dark sections (hero, mission/vision, global footprint, CTA)
tested_features.navigation: PASS - Navigation between / and /about works both ways via navbar links
tested_features.modals_newsletter: PASS - Contact modal opens from navbar 'Get in Touch', newsletter form submits correctly
tested_features.glass_morphism: PASS - glass-card-dark (2 on about) and glass-card-light (13 on homepage, 7 on about) rendering with backdrop-blur
tested_features.fonts: PASS - Fraunces serif for headlines (80px H1), Outfit sans-serif for body text
